CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 1, 1945, pg. 2, reads: "German Souvenir - George (Chick) Cooley Jr., son of Mr. and Mrs. George Cooley Sr., of 2600 Wylie Avenue, is shown holding a German sword sent home by his father, who is serving with the 784th Tank Battalion.  George Jr. is the grandson of Mrs. Bertha Croom. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of George "Chick" Cooley Jr. holding German sword in Harris Studio, another version
